title: Advent Launches Programs to Promote Diversity Among Its Portfolio Leadership
sub_head: Advent International aims to increase racial, gender and sexual orientation diversity across its portfolio companies
body:
Global private-equity firm Advent International has formed two new initiatives designed to help members of historically underrepresented groups climb the corporate ladder at its portfolio companies.
Advent is joining with Harvard Business School to offer a corporate training program for professionals from across its North American portfolio companies. The program is focused initially on women, Blacks, Latinos and people who donâ€™t identify as heterosexual. The firm is also working with consulting firm Paradigm Strategy Inc....
